name: (Alpha Page)Anime School Simulator| Open World Anime Style
name_original: (Alpha Page)Anime School Simulator| Open World Anime Style
description:
"insert name here" will be an open world anime game for Android, you will be able to walk freely around the city or stay 1 hour customizing Sakura.

I'm a beginner developer and I'm working alone, don't expect to be a great game with no bugs :)
